import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../assets/cssModules/industries.module.css'; import useAxiosFetch from '../../hooks/useAxiosFetch'; import defaultData from '../../data/defaultData.json' import useData from '../../hooks/useData'; const IndustriesList = () => { const getElement = (industry, index) => { if (index % 2 === 0) { return (

our industries

{industry.name}

{industry.paragraph}

LEARN MORE
) } return (

our industries

{industry.name}

{industry.paragraph}

LEARN MORE
) } const path = 'http://localhost:3500/industries'; const { list } = useData(path, defaultData.industries, getElement) return (
{list}
) } export default IndustriesList;
